SENT.plain: A 38-year-old man with Marfan syndrome presented with headache and neck pain
MR imaging revealed a large enhancing mass in the cervical anterior epidural space
Cervical laminectomy with biopsy of the lesion revealed a large engorged anterior epidural venous plexus (AEVP)
Marfan syndrome may predispose the patient to enlargement of AEVP secondary to a vessel wall abnormality
